### What's being changed (if available, include any code snippets, screenshots, or gifs):
Updated content acc. to https://github.com/github/docs/issues/39246#issuecomment-3058217898 :

1. Clarified the intro to emphasize these are examples of commonly used labels, not an exhaustive list
2. Added explicit quote that the repository uses 85 labels with a link to the complete labels page
